name: Shrink the planets!
description:
This is my submission for the BlackThornProd game jam with the theme of Mini Planets.

You fly your ship around using SpaceBar for the thrusters. While holding space you can also press the Left CTRL key for a Thrust Boost to escape out of the planets atmosphere.

You need to drop bombs using the Left Shift key to blow up the planets and shrink them while trying to avoid or destroy the satelites orbiting the planets.
